'''''Oh, Frabjous Day!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Buried Chests in Ashavan Realm]]''.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to Lewis Carroll's poem ''{{w|Jabberwocky}}''.
